Commit.Modified: java/src/org/apache/xalan/processor StylesheetHandler.java java/src/org/apache/xpath Expression.java XPath.java XPathContext.java java/src/org/apache/xpath/compiler Compiler.java XPathParser.java
Commit.Log:
Renamed "assert()" to "assertion()".
Assert can be a keyword, and brake the compilation.
Throw an error message if the key name in a key function was not defined
Reworked "chunk growth" algorithm again. Growing mode not yet adequately tested, but fixed-size mode (which is what Xalan is currently using) is simpler code and shows improved performance.
Utility class to check your JVM environment for common problems
Double-semicolon fixed so Henri's compiler stops complaining about an unreachable statement. <grin/>
